      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addPluginLocationsToClassPath(java.lang.String tpHome)
      Add class folders and jar files in the lib directories for all plugins.
      static java.net.URL createValidFileURL(java.net.URL url)
      Transforms the given URL which may contain escaping characters (like %20 for space) to an URL which may conatin illegal URL characters (like space) but is valid for creating a file based on the resulting URL The escape characters will be changed back to characters that are illegal in URLs (like space) because the file could be constructed just in such a way in some servlet containers like Tomcat5.5
      static void extractArchiveFromClasspath(java.lang.String dirInClasspath, java.lang.String filter, java.io.File toDir) 
      static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAnalyzersFromJars(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
      Search the lucene analyzer implementations from the /WEB-INF/lib The search will take place only in jars with the following naming pattern "lucene.jar"
      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getBundles() 
      static java.io.File getFileFromURL(java.net.URL url)
      Gets a file with a given path relativ to classes directory from the WEB-INF
      static java.io.File[] getFilesFromDir(java.io.File directory, java.io.FilenameFilter filter)
      Gets the files from a directory which satisfy a FileFilter
      static java.util.List<java.io.File> getJavaScriptExtensionDirs()
      Returns a list with directories from /plugins//js containing JavaScript extensions for plugins.

      Gets a file (or directory) with a specific name from the root of the web application

      • createValidFileURL

        public static java.net.URL createValidFileURL(java.net.URL url)
        Transforms the given URL which may contain escaping characters (like %20 for space) to an URL which may conatin illegal URL characters (like space) but is valid for creating a file based on the resulting URL The escape characters will be changed back to characters that are illegal in URLs (like space) because the file could be constructed just in such a way in some servlet containers like Tomcat5.5
        Parameters:
        url -
        Returns:

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAnalyzersFromJars(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
        Search the lucene analyzer implementations from the /WEB-INF/lib The search will take place only in jars with the following naming pattern "lucene.jar"
        Parameters:
        servletContext -
        Returns:

      • addPluginLocationsToClassPath

        public static void addPluginLocationsToClassPath(java.lang.String tpHome)
        Add class folders and jar files in the lib directories for all plugins.
        Parameters:
        tpHome - the Genji home directory which includes the plugin directory

      • getBundles

      • getJavaScriptExtensionDirs

        public static java.util.List<java.io.File> getJavaScriptExtensionDirs()
        Returns a list with directories from /plugins//js containing JavaScript extensions for plugins. The classes there are added to the ExtJS namespace path as "pluginXY":path for dynamic loading.
        Returns:

      • unzipFileIntoDirectory

        public static void unzipFileIntoDirectory(java.io.File zipFile,
                          java.io.File targetDir)
        Unzip this file into the given directory. If the zipFile is called "zipFile.zip", the files will be placed into "targetDir/zipFile".
        Parameters:
        zipFile -
        targetDir -
